projectGridLines.title: Program Management to enhance Sales throughput and performance
projectGridLines.description:
Description: The purpose of this project is to enhance the program management aspect of the sales function. By implementing improved processes, tools, and methodologies, this initiative aims to streamline sales operations, optimize resource allocation, improve internal/external stakeholder management and enhance overall sales performance

1.       Skill sets: Program Management skills

2.       Analytics & Data Interpretation Abilities

Communication & Collaboration

-         Expected learning: End to end understanding of Lending and Supply Chain Financing business.

Enhanced Business Analytics skills with hands-on experience on SQL & other data analytics tools.

projectGridLines.title: Title: Analytics & Fact Tables
projectGridLines.description:
Title: Analytics & Fact Tables

Project Description:- Help drive business decision making with analytics and projects, Work with Tech and Business teams to establish data flows to build source of truth fact tables.

 

Skillsets needed - Analytical bent of mind, Good with numbers and data, Excel, SqL and python are good to have skills.

Domain - Management/Others

Expected learning: Data led decision making, Analytics, Project Management

Specific courses required for project execution: N/A
